Package com.deco2800.game.components.player

Class PlayerRangeAttackComponent

java.lang.Object
com.deco2800.game.components.Component
com.deco2800.game.components.player.PlayerRangeAttackComponent
public class PlayerRangeAttackComponent
extends Component
Used to listen and wait for player's range button to be clicked (L key). Once clicked, a bullet will be created from player's entity position and launched towards coordinate where range button is clicked in game area. If no movement keys clicked, range attack will be launched to the right by default

  • Field Summary

    • getActiveBullets

      public static Array<Entity> getActiveBullets()

      Returns:
      array of bullet entities that are currently active and ready to be used

    • scaleVector

      public Vector2 scaleVector​(Vector2 playerCoord)
      Returns Vector2 coordinates that will be used for target coordinates for bullets. These vectors are then scaled to reach the end of the game screen relative to player's position.
      Parameters:
      playerCoord - is the current player's position. It is used to launch bullet from player's position
      Returns:
      coordinates used for bullet's target coordinates

    • setDirection

      public void setDirection​(Vector2 direction)
      Set the current direction player is currently facing for range attack
      Parameters:

    • reloadGunMagazine

      public void reloadGunMagazine​(int ammo)
      Called to reload current gun magazine capacity. May not always be reloaded to 5 (the max). It is dependent on ammo left in inventory
      Parameters:
      ammo - that will be reloaded into gun magazine

    • setReloadingStatus

      public void setReloadingStatus​(boolean reloading)

      Parameters:

    • getReloadingStatus

      Returns:

    • getGunMagazine
